body_html: I'd like to build a TensorFlow Graph and update its parameters, in addition to doing inference, from within an Android app. How do you suggest doing this / why is it not possible to use the Java API directly instead of the wrapper?
body_text: I'd like to build a TensorFlow Graph and update its parameters, in addition to doing inference, from within an Android app. How do you suggest doing this / why is it not possible to use the Java API directly instead of the wrapper?
